name: node-markitondemand
description: Node library for dev.markitondemand.com REST APIs.

scripts.test: npm run cov && npm run mocha && npm run coveralls
scripts.istanbul: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.cov-html: npm run cov && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test -R html-cov > coverage.html

author: Ahmed Farooki
